title: GoTradie Mobile App
subtitle: Gotradie | Australia
des: GoTradie is a platform which allows tradies (eg: Electricians, Plumbers, carpenters) to manage their business and maintain own team and do communications between them and manage their worksites etc. Also it allows to communicate with their customer and update progress of the site. Gotradie chat has many features like messaging, sending images, videos and document through the chats. also business owners can maintain business profile with more information about their businesses and owned licenses etc. Which has communication features like messaging and getting Video/Audio calls option

title: Leap
subtitle: Al Istiqamah Mosque | Singapore
des: Leap Initiative is a new programme developed by the Social Development Centre in conjunction with the Islamic Religious Council Singapore (MUIS) to provide you and your family with the support and resources to help you thrive.

title: Fetch Me
subtitle: Fetch Me | Singapore
des: Fetch me is a delivery app which allows to register fetchers and buyers in a sames app. This includes stripe payment integration and verified fetcher options. Buyer can simple place a order with pick up place and delivery please and instruction etc and try the order receiving process when it connected with a fetcher

title: EFL Marketing dashboard
subtitle: EFL | Sri Lanka
des: This project done based on EFL's requirement. They wanted a dashboard which showing the overall status of their offices country wise based on the information they feed of each offices. Using this application they will get important decisions for their overall shipments. Each area's current situation and weather information will be taken each week through their offices and validate them through the workflow approval level. Finally approved information will process update dashboard realtime. Also they will notify it via email along with generated PDF report to their clients around the world based on their prefer area.
